summary: This document contains financial information related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management as of October 31, 2014. It includes details about account balances, transactions, and asset classes, highlighting the significant amounts managed and the nature of the investments. The document is marked confidential and includes disclaimers regarding the accuracy and management of the accounts.
